00020     {
00021         cout << "File: " << argv[1] << endl;
00022

00024         time( &referenceTime );

00027         readImages( &pdf, argv[1] );

00029         // Get elapsed time
00030         time( &elapsedTime);
00031         averagingTime = difftime( elapsedTime, referenceTime );
00032
